cart:add_to_cart_text.description: The button text for adding an item to the cart.

cart:async_btn_text.description: The text displayed while a cart item is being added to the cart, while waiting for a server response.

cart:cart_empty.description: The text to display when there are no items inside of the cart.

cart:cart_title.description: The text displayed at the top of the cart indicating that it is the user's shopping cart.

cart:checkout_text.description: The button text for checking out the cart items, proceeding to payment.

cart:item.description: The heading for the cart's column 'item', indicating the name of the product.

cart:price.description: The heading for the cart's column 'price', indicating the cost of the product.

cart:quantity.description: The heading for the cart's column 'quantity', indicating that the column contains the number of items

cart:remove_from_cart_text.description: The button text for removing an item from the cart.

cart:remove_from_cart_text_variant.description: The button text for removing an item from the cart.

cart:subtotal_label.description: The text before the amount of currency that the sum of the items in the cart amount to.

collection:learn_more_link.description: Link text, linking to a collection page where the user can learn more about the collection.

collection:shop_this_collection_btn.description: Button text, taking the user to the shop where they can buy products of the current collection.

collection:view_collection_link.description: Link text, link the user to the collection's page.

collections:collection_items_heading.description: A heading before a list of items within a single collection.

concept: none.description: The concept or idea of 'none', or 'zero'.

concept:collection.description: The concept of a collection, or group of items.

concept:or.description: The word 'or' when used in a choice. i.e., 'apples or oranges'

contact:contact_form_title.description: The title to the contact form, letting the user know what the form does.

contact:email_field_label.description: The label for the input where the user inputs their email address.

contact:loading_spinner_alttext.description: Screen Reader / Alternative text for a loading spinner, while sending a message.

contact:message_field_label.description: The label for the text area where the user types their message.

contact:message_sent.description: Text notifying the user that their message was sent without any errors or problems.

contact:message_sent_details.message: Thanks for reaching out, we will get back to you as fast as we can!
contact:message_sent_details.description: Text giving the user information on what to expect after a message was sent.

contact:name_field_label.description: The label for the input where the user inputs their name.

contact:reason_for_contact_dropdown_labe.description: Text for a dropdown menu with options describing why they're contacting us

contact:reason_for_contact_dropdown_opti.description: Text for a dropdown menu option, in which the user wants to provide feedback about anything related to our service or product
Text for a dropdown menu option, in which the user is contacting us about a problem with their order
Text for a dropdown menu option, in which the user wants to ask a question or get more information
Text for a dropdown menu option, in which the user is contacting us to 'say hello'

contact:send_message_btn.description: The button text for submitting a contact form, resulting in a sent message.

contact:sending_message_btn.description: The button text after clicking to submit a contact form. The user is waiting for a response from the server

contact:validation_form_has_errors.message: The information you submitted has errors. Please fix them, and then resubmit the form.
contact:validation_form_has_errors.description: Error message displayed when a contact form is attempted to be sent while it's fields contain errors.

contact:validation_invalid_email.message: The email you entered is invalid.
contact:validation_invalid_email.description: Error message displayed when a contact form is attempted to be sent with an invalid email address field.

contact:validation_invalid_message.description: Error message displayed when a contact form is attempted to be sent with an empty message field.

contact:validation_invalid_name.message: Your name can not be empty.
contact:validation_invalid_name.description: Error message displayed when a contact form is attempted to be sent with an invalid name field.

contact:validation_invalid_reason.message: The reason you provided is invalid. Use the dropdown menu to select a reason.
contact:validation_invalid_reason.description: Error message displayed when a contact form is attempted to be sent with an invalid reason.

faq:description.message: Refer to the Questions and Answers below before. If you don''t find your question contact us and we''ll answer it.
faq:description.description: The Frequently Asked Questions description text, describing what the FAQ is used for.

faq:no_questions_yet.message: We haven''t been asked very many question yet.
faq:no_questions_yet.description: The Frequently Asked Questions page text, before we add questions and answers to it.

faq:page_title.description: The Frequently Asked Questions Page's title

footer:site_name.description: The text before the copyright symbol, at the footer of the page.

home:page_description.message: This is the homepage of Value Link
home:page_description.description: The Home Page's description or Value Link's business motto

how_we_work:how_we_work_paragraph1.description: The How We Work Page's title

how_we_work:page_description.message: Learn the intricate processes of Value Link
how_we_work:page_description.description: The How We Work Page's description

how_we_work:page_title.description: The How We Work Page's title

navigation:about_link_text.description: The link text for navigating to the 'about' page.

navigation:collections_link_text.description: The link text for navigating to the 'collections' page.

navigation:contact_link_text.description: The link text for navigating to the 'contact' page.

navigation:faq_link_text.description: The link text for navigating to the 'faq' page.

navigation:home_link_text.description: The link text for navigating to the 'home' page.

navigation:how_we_work_link_text.description: The link text for navigating to the 'How We Work' page.

navigation:shop_link_text.description: The link text for navigating to the 'shop' page.

navigation:transparency_link_text.description: The link text for navigating to the 'Transparency' page.

not_found:404_description.message: 404 Errors happen when a URL is incorrect, or a page that once existed was moved.
not_found:404_description.description: A short summary of what a 404 error is.

not_found:how_to_continue_heading.description: The heading of a section describing what steps the user can take next.

not_found:how_to_continue_step_1.message: Double-check that the URL is correct (i.e., ''shop'' and not ''shpo'')
not_found:how_to_continue_step_1.description: The first step, describing how the user can resolve their problem by making sure the url is correct.

not_found:how_to_continue_step_2.message: If the page should be available, let us know you ran into this problem.
not_found:how_to_continue_step_2.description: The next step, describing how the user can contact support.

not_found:how_to_continue_step_3_1.description: The third step that tells the user to move on, or return to shopping.

not_found:how_to_continue_step_3_2.description: The text that links to the homepage

not_found:page_subtitle.description: The '404 error, page not found' Page's subtitle

not_found:page_title.description: The '404 error, page not found' Page's title

product:details_pid.description: The table heading 'PID', short for Product ID

product:details_type.description: The table heading 'Type'. Type examples: 'desk' or 'sofa'.

product:img_alt_text.description: Alternative text describing the product image.

product_item:product_image_alt_text.description: The screen reader compatible alternative text for a product's image

product_item:product_image_placeholder_t.message: No image available for this product yet
product_item:product_image_placeholder_t.description: The screen reader compatible alternative text for a product that is missing an image.

transparency:content_paragraph.description: The Transparency page's content paragraph, describing the transparency of our brand.
